home.description: My name is Franco Rodriguez and I'm a Backend Programmer.

aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.description: I'm a backend developer passionate about technology, continuous learning and solving complex problems. I started my professional career as a nutritionist, but my curiosity for the digital world led me to specialize in programming, focusing on JavaScript and backend technologies. I have more than a year of experience leading backend development teams, with knowledge in cybersecurity applied to APIs, Dockerization of applications and the use of tools like LangChain for innovative solutions based on artificial intelligence. I love to delve into technical topics and face new challenges that allow me to keep growing professionally. I'm ready to contribute with impactful and efficient solutions!
